creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
This is a bug in JDBCRealm, after i login,
it will have a null pointer exception!

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.apache.tomcat.util.SecurityTools.haveRole(SecurityTools.java:195)
	at org.apache.tomcat.request.SimpleRealm.authorize(SimpleRealm.java:160)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.doAuthorize(ContextManager.java:807)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.internalService(ContextManager.java:741)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.service(ContextManager.java:695)
	at org.apache.tomcat.service.connector.Ajp12ConnectionHandler.processConnection(Ajp12ConnectionHandler.java:166)
	at org.apache.tomcat.service.TcpWorkerThread.runIt(PoolTcpEndpoint.java:403)
	at org.apache.tomcat.util.ThreadPool$ControlRunnable.run(ThreadPool.java:498)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:484)

Fixed in Tomcat 3.3
Fixed in Tomcat 3.2.1
creator: nacho@apache.org
